            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【违规发放口罩 武汉市3名职能部门领导被问责】近日，武汉市严肃查处了市防疫应急物资储备仓库违规发放口罩问题。经武汉市纪委监委研究，并报市委批准，决定免去夏国华武汉市统计局党组成员、副局长职务，并给予其党内严重警告、政务记大过处分；对武汉市发改委党组书记、主任，市统 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsDZ4wCCz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468268867774959:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468268867774959&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2286908003/IsDZ4wCCz&amp;mid=4468268867774959&amp;name=人民网&amp;uid=2286908003&amp;domain=renminwang&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gbkga1szjcj20go0goae5" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>118</em></span></span></span></a>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E7%97%85%E6%AD%BB%E7%8E%872.1%25%23&amp;from=default">#全国确诊病例病死率2.1%#</a>】2月4日，国家卫生健康委发布会上，国家卫健委医政医管局副局长焦雅辉表示，截至到3日晚24时，全国确诊病例的病死率是2.1%。湖北省3.1%，武汉市4.9%，湖北省死亡病例占全国97%。除湖北省外，其他省病死率0.16%。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4468268209785404:1042163-video:1042163%3A4468268115623963:page_100206_home:2286908003:4468268209785404:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6PQ6DrL" alt="http://t.cn/A6PQ6DrL" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E5%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1275%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#山东新增5例累计275例#</a>】2020年2月4日0—12时，山东省报告新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎新增确诊病例5例，累计确诊病例275例(含重症病例20例，危重症病例3例，出院9例，无死亡病例);新增疑似病例12例，现有疑似病例73例。截至目前，追踪到密切接触者9152人，已解除医学观察2927人，诊断 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsDS3i2xs" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468264514299666:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468264514299666&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                <a name="4468261535881668" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsDNfoG5C?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 15:07" date="1580800029000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468261535881668:fromprofile"> 2月4日 15:07</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%91%E5%8D%97%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E2%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1119%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#云南新增2例累计119例#</a>】2月4日0时至12时，云南省报告新型冠状病毒感染肺炎新增病例2例（曲靖市1例、楚雄州1例）。<br>全省累计报告确诊病例119例，除治愈出院者外，现均在定点医院接受隔离治疗。现有危重3例，重症13例，治愈出院5例，疑似病例160例，密切接触者医学观察3788人，无 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsDNfoG5C" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468261535881668:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468261535881668&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月4日 15:12</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【直播：国家卫健委2月4日新闻发布会】2月4日下午，国家卫健委召开新闻发布会，介绍新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎重症患者的医疗救治情况。国家卫健委新闻发言人宋树立、国家卫健委医政医管局副局长焦雅辉、科技部生物中心副主任孙燕荣、国家医疗专家组成员李兴旺将介绍最新消息。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsDKHlLOi" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468259955188674:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468259955188674&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609337916&amp;ssig=3n9P5V3L6c" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4468259934404497" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsDKFitOh?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 15:00" date="1580799647000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468259934404497:fromprofile"> 2月4日 15:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%9C%81%E7%BA%A2%E5%8D%81%E5%AD%97%E4%BC%9A3%E5%90%8D%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E8%A2%AB%E9%97%AE%E8%B4%A3%23&amp;from=default">#湖北省红十字会3名领导被问责#</a>】针对反映湖北省红十字会在捐赠款物接收分配中的有关问题，湖北省纪委监委迅速开展调查核实工作。经调查，省红十字会有关领导和干部在疫情防控期间接收和分配捐赠款物工作中存在不担当不作为、违反“三重一大”规定、信息公开错误等失职失责问题，经湖北省纪委监委研 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsDEnwuhi" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468256037742888:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468256037742888&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        </li>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2286908003&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4468256037742888"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>757</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

        </div>
    </div>

                                <a name="4468252204126728" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsDychjy8?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 14:30" date="1580797803000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468252204126728:fromprofile"> 2月4日 14:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%83%E9%87%8C%E4%B9%8B%E5%A4%96%E7%9A%84%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E5%A4%AB%E5%A6%BB%23&amp;from=default">#千里之外的战疫夫妻#</a>】段娟和她的丈夫王星，一个在湖北，一个在内蒙。他们都奋战在战疫一线，每天没时间打电话，两人往往是互相发个微信等对方看见了再一并回复。段娟说：“虽然舍小家，但是为了大家。在内蒙，王星能发挥他的热量，而在湖北，能发挥我的光亮！” ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsDychjy8" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468252204126728:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468252204126728&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <ul class="WB_row_line WB_row_r4 clearfix S_line2">

                        <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=collect_guest" href="javascript:void(0);" diss-data="fuid=2286908003" action-type="fl_favorite"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="favorite_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_favorite S_ficon">û</em><em>收藏</em></span></span></span></a>

                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->

                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a>【小时候我骄傲有你，长大后我成了你<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2003年，孙颖的妈妈站在抗击非典的前线。这一次，孙颖请战去武汉，还有40天就要退休的孙妈妈仍奋战在隔离病房。孙颖说此次出征，对她而言是一次传承，也是一次接班。“妈妈，我来接班了，您可以放心退休了。”（人民网四川频道） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsDxg3bEC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468251620759786:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468251620759786&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【放弃行程！贵州小伙国外辗转带回2万个口罩支援武汉】原计划的马来西亚假期，变成了印尼奔袭之旅。听到国内防护物资紧缺后，贵州小伙吴斌在短短5日内，在没有任何证明文件的情况下，用一口“塑料英语”，完成了2万只口罩、200个护目镜的采购、过关、保管、运送、邮寄，支援武汉市第九医院。贵州工行宝 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsDq4s90a" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468247166707790:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468247166707790&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IsDkC7J1q&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frenminwang&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609337925&amp;ssig=1jh0iRpeTY" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4468238618112211" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsDchy2m7?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 13:36" date="1580794565000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468238618112211:fromprofile"> 2月4日 13:36</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民网评：疫情防控要坚持全国一盘棋】“没有一个冬天不可逾越，没有一个春天不会来临。”防控疫情不可能速战速决，我们要做好应有的心理准备，同时，也要坚定必胜的信心。疫情当前，我们是命运共同体，也是责任共同体。只要坚持全国一盘棋，群策群力、同舟共济、科学防治、精准施策，同时间赛跑、与 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsDchy2m7" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468238618112211:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468238618112211&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                <a name="4468236022078181" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsD868ID3?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 13:25" date="1580793946000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468236022078181:fromprofile"> 2月4日 13:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"><a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A6%8F%E5%BB%BA170%E4%BA%BA%E5%9B%A0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E4%B8%8D%E5%8A%9B%E8%A2%AB%E5%A4%84%E7%90%86%23&amp;from=default">#福建170人因疫情防控不力被处理#</a>】福建省纪委监委通报，疫情发生以来严肃依规依纪依法追责问责疫情防控工作不力问题，共查处100起、处理170人，其中给予党纪政务处分12人。通报指出，疫情防控哪怕一节脱链、一棒失手，都可能对人民群众的生命安全和身体健康造成不可挽回的重大损失。（福建省 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsD868ID3" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468236022078181:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468236022078181&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2286908003/IsD868ID3&amp;mid=4468236022078181&amp;name=人民网&amp;uid=2286908003&amp;domain=renminwang&amp;pid=884f7263gy1gbkaxep895j215n0oaqec" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>84</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4468234621085623" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsD5Q4yq3?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 13:20" date="1580793612000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468234621085623:fromprofile"> 2月4日 13:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民来论：拒绝聚集，不给“战疫”添堵】各地披露的聚集性疫情，令人警醒。抗击疫情，要在做好自我防护的基础上，提高自我约束，个体层面冷静克制，科学预防，就扎稳了疫情防控的最基本的防线。今天的“宅”，是为了明天的“嗨”；今天的克制，是为了明天的“撒欢儿”。疫情当前，拒绝侥幸和扎堆，就 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsD5Q4yq3" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468234621085623:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468234621085623&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/5620967592" usercard="id=5620967592">随州需要关注</a>：随州市常住人口只有221万人，冠状病毒最新感染人数却达到了641人(昨天新增183 例)，从人均比例上已经湖北省第二了。目前，没有听到有医疗队增援，也没有分配到更多物资，更是没有主流媒体报道过。随州市只有随州市中心医院一家三级甲等医院，医疗救治水平都很有限。给随州实质性的帮助！救救随州吧        </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4468233141091073" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsD3s4zPX?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 13:14" date="1580793259000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468233141091073:fromprofile"> 2月4日 13:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E8%97%8F%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD5%E5%A4%A9%E6%97%A0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#西藏连续5天无新增病例#</a>】截至2020年2月3日24时，西藏自治区累计报告新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎确诊病例1例，重症病例0例，死亡病例0例，出院病例0例。<br>目前，患者生命体征平稳，追踪到的密切接触者正在接受医学观察。<br>据了解，这是西藏自治区连续第5天没有新增确诊病例或疑似病例的 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsD3s4zPX" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468233141091073:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468233141091073&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4468231223850771" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsD0mg9Ld?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 13:06" date="1580792802000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468231223850771:fromprofile"> 2月4日 13:06</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【四川内江<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%9D%E8%A7%84%E8%81%9A%E4%BC%9A%E8%A2%AB%E5%85%8D%E8%81%8C%E5%89%AF%E9%95%87%E9%95%BF%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#违规聚会被免职副镇长确诊新冠肺炎#</a>】据四川省内江市卫健委消息，截至2月3日24时，内江市新增3例新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎确诊病例。<br><br>其中1例患者郑某，男，36岁，现住内江市市中区文英街。1月25日、26日晚分别与途经武汉返乡人员龙某（1月30日确诊）在龙湾半岛宣和茶楼、 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsD0mg9Ld" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468231223850771:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468231223850771&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IsDLouk9l&amp;type=2&amp;url=&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=6', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a></span></li>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【点赞！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%91%E5%8D%9793%E6%88%B7%E6%9D%91%E6%B0%91%E6%8D%90%E8%B5%A022%E5%90%A8%E9%A6%99%E8%95%89%23&amp;from=default">#云南93户村民捐赠22吨香蕉#</a>】“我们家是建档立卡户，曾经我也受到过大家的帮助，这次一方有难，我也愿意把我家的香蕉捐出来，尽自己的一份力。”<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，在得知湖北可能水果短缺的消息后，云南93户村民自发捐赠了22吨香蕉，而他们中有47户是建档立卡户<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">（人民网云南频道） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsCXBtdrl" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468229516963179:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468229516963179&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E8%88%AA%E5%B1%80%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E7%A1%AE%E4%BF%9D%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E8%88%AA%E7%8F%AD%E4%B8%8D%E6%96%AD%E8%88%AA%23&amp;from=default">#民航局要求确保国际航班不断航#</a>】受新型冠状病毒疫情影响，国际航空市场需求锐减，部分国家对我国公民出入境实施了限制措施。目前已有46家外国航空公司宣布暂停往来中国大陆的航班。为满足特殊时期旅客出入境和物资国际运输需求，民航局要求国内各航空公司在考虑市场需求取消部分 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsCHJsgXV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468219676738403:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468219676738403&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4468207354295406" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsCnRi1qK?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 11:31" date="1580787111000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468207354295406:fromprofile"> 2月4日 11:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【好消息！广东<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%B1%B111%E6%9C%88%E5%A4%A7%E5%A9%B4%E5%84%BF%E5%8F%8A%E5%85%B6%E7%88%B6%E6%AF%8D%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#中山11月大婴儿及其父母治愈出院#</a>】2月3日，广东中山首批一家3口确诊病例治愈出院，系一对夫妻加上一位11个月大的婴儿。此次治愈出院的3人中，患者温某，男性，36岁，2020年1月10-12日到武汉市出差，17日发病，21日来中山，住石岐区，23日收入定点医疗机构隔离治疗。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsCnRi1qK" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468207354295406:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468207354295406&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> 【教育部：各地原计划<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A3%E5%BC%8F%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E5%89%8D%E4%B8%8D%E8%A6%81%E6%8F%90%E5%89%8D%E5%BC%80%E5%A7%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%AD%A6%E6%9C%9F%E8%AF%BE%E7%A8%8B%E7%BD%91%E4%B8%8A%E6%95%99%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#正式开学前不要提前开始新学期课程网上教学#</a>】由于现在正值寒假期间，学生需要完成寒假作业，过早提供新学期线上课程，将会增加学生学业负担。为此，教育部提醒各级教育行政部门、中小学和校外培训机构，在各地原计划的正式开学日之前，不要提前开始新学期课 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsCliypFv" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468205768201825:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468205768201825&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A6%8F%E5%BB%BA%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E15%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1194%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#福建新增15例累计194例#</a>】2月3日0—24时，福建省报告新增新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎确诊病例15例。其中：<br>　　福州市6例（仓山区2例、晋安区2例、闽清县1例、福清市1例）；<br>　　厦门市1例（思明区1例）；<br>　　泉州市4例（惠安县1例、晋江市2例、南安市1例）；<br>　　莆田市3例（城厢区 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsChOApAd" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468203608678153:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468203608678153&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4468206846385902&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=3499157441&amp;commentmid=4468203608678153" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class="">                                <em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>赞</em></span></a>                                </span></li>

                            </ul>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4468194464764798" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsC34jZxA?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 10:40" date="1580784038000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468194464764798:fromprofile"> 2月4日 10:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E9%A6%96%E4%BE%8B%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#香港出现首例死亡病例#</a>：39岁男性患者死亡】今天，据香港媒体报道：香港一名39岁的新型冠状病毒男性感染者死亡。该患者系香港出现新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情以来的首例死亡病例。据香港卫生部门消息，截至昨天中午12时，香港共确诊15例病例，仍有159人住院接受进一步检查。（央视） ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->
    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx4.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2F884f7263ly1gbk64285hdj20go0got9x.jpg">

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A35%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#内蒙古累计确诊35例#</a>】截至2020年2月4日9时，内蒙古自治区累计报告新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎确诊病例35例，其中：呼和浩特市4例(新城区2例、玉泉区1例、赛罕区1例)，包头市6例（昆都仑区3例、土右旗3例），呼伦贝尔市3例（满洲里市1例已痊愈出院、牙克石市1例、莫力达瓦旗1例），兴 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsBZWtMUC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468192527099534:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468192527099534&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%99%95%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E14%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A142%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#陕西新增14例累计确诊142例#</a>】截至2月4日10时，陕西新增14例新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎确诊病例，新增重症患者1例，新增疑似病例53例。新增确诊病例中，西安市5例、宝鸡市2例、咸阳市2例、汉中市1例、商洛市3例、杨凌示范区1例。陕西累计报告新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎确诊病例142例（1 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsBXKAyQP" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468191168713779:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468191168713779&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a>【瞒着家人去前线 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A5%B3%E5%86%9B%E5%8C%BB%E7%9C%8B%E5%88%B0%E4%B8%88%E5%A4%AB%E5%BE%AE%E4%BF%A1%E5%90%8E%E8%90%BD%E6%B3%AA%23&amp;from=default">#女军医看到丈夫微信后落泪#</a>】军队支援湖北医疗队队员彭渝瞒着家人驰援武汉，丈夫直到看见别人发的照片，才知道她已出发。两人电话里大吵一架后，丈夫给彭渝发了一条微信：你是我妻也是战友，盼凯旋！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E5%B9%BF%E5%86%9B%E4%BA%8B?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央广军事">@央广军事</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4468189671123385:1034-video:1034%3A4467966755143686:page_100206_home:2286908003:4468189671123385:2286908003" title="央视军事的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6PHU1uj" alt="http://t.cn/A6PHU1uj" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视军事的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【视频：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%81%AB%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E6%8E%A5%E8%AF%8A%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#武汉火神山医院接诊首批患者#</a>！】2月4日，首批转运患者抵达火神山医院。火神山医院于2日已正式交付解放军支援湖北医疗队。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8A%A0%E6%B2%B9%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#加油武汉#</a>！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> ​​​​<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4468185736635098:1034-video:1034%3A4468183487414308:page_100206_home:2286908003:4468185736635098:2286908003" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6PHavW2" alt="http://t.cn/A6PHavW2" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->

        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>

        </div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/7198166795" usercard="id=7198166795">57粥真好喝</a>：在恒源小区和恒远水岸的交接处，市三中门口那里<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face">我们两个小区一向不怎么分，路都打通的，就在我家斜对楼，今天早上一觉起来真的慌了                    </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4468179814475076" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsBFriMaE?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 09:42" date="1580780545000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468179814475076:fromprofile"> 2月4日 09:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%81%AB%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E6%8E%A5%E8%AF%8A%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#武汉火神山医院接诊首批患者#</a>！】2月4日上午9时许，转运首批患者的车辆抵达火神山医院。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A114%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广东新增确诊114例#</a>，广东累计确诊797例】截至2月3日24时，全省累计报告新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎确诊病例797例。3日当天全省新增确诊病例114例，新增确诊病例中，深圳市43例、广州市27例、珠海市13例、中山市6例、东莞市6例、肇庆市3例、佛山市3例、阳江市2例、清远市2例、梅州市2 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsBvVtpet" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468173917008509:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468173917008509&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4468171262040176" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsBrE8yK4?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-04 09:08" date="1580778506000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4468171262040176:fromprofile"> 2月4日 09:08</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B1%9F%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E85%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1476%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#江西新增85例累计476例#</a>】2020年2月3日0-24时，江西省报告新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎新增确诊病例85例，新增治愈出院病例1例。<br>　　新增确诊病例中，南昌市18例、上饶市18例、九江市14例、新余市9例、宜春市9例、赣州市7例、抚州市5例、萍乡市2例、吉安市2例、景德镇1例。新增治愈出 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsBrE8yK4" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4468171262040176:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4468171262040176&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

a||(a[g]=d(c));a.css=h=[].concat(a.css||[]);a.cssid=i=[].concat(a.cssid||[]);for(var j=i.length,k=h.length;j<k;++j)i[j]=e(h[j]);b(a)}}()
</script>
<script>FM.view({"domid":"pl_lib","js":"home/js/pl/lib.js?version=737b1bcbc5c6542c","jsDefer":true});</script>

                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%9C%81%E7%BA%A2%E5%8D%81%E5%AD%97%E4%BC%9A3%E5%90%8D%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E8%A2%AB%E9%97%AE%E8%B4%A3%23&from=default\">#湖北省红十字会3名领导被问责#<\/a>】针对反映湖北省红十字会在捐赠款物接收分配中的有关问题，湖北省纪委监委迅速开展调查核实工作。经调查，省红十字会有关领导和干部在疫情防控期间接收和分配捐赠款物工作中存在不担当不作为、违反“三重一大”规定、信息公开错误等失职失责问题，经湖北省纪委监委研                                 <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_list" node-type="toggle_list" title="展开列表" action-type="toggle_list"></a>
                                <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_lyric ico_lyric_open" node-type="toggle_lrc" action-type="toggle_lrc" title="显示歌词">词</a>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="fold_ctrl_area" title="展开" action-type="toggle_fold" node-type="toggle_fold"><div class="mask"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_unfold ico_fold"></a></div></div>
        <div class="lyric_wrap" node-type="lrc" style="display:none">
    <div class="lyric_bg">
        <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_close" title="关闭" action-type="toggle_lrc"></a>
        <div class="content" style="cursor: pointer;">
            <div class="tcol_sub" node-type="lrc_content" style="margin-top: 15px;"></div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
    </div>
